title: Kirk Cousins & Bonus Football Everywhere
description:
We clean up MNF and see the beginning of the end for Doug Pederson and Carson Wentz. (2:18-10:40) The NFL schedule is in flux and itâ€™s bonus football season. Steroids on the Texans. (10:40-16:08) Hot Seat Cool Throne including Bill Walton and Billy vs Jake Paul.(16:40-34:24) Vikings QB Kirk Cousins joins the show to talk about a million different questions the guys had including Creed, Primetime, the Grill picture and tons more. (35:56-1:12:08) Segments include embrace debate (1:13:20-1:17:22) and guys on chicks(1:17:23-1:27:12)


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/PardonMyTake
